name: CLARITY_ADT
description: The CLARITY_ADT table is the master table for ADT event history information. This table contains several foreign keys for other ADT tables.

columns.name: EVENT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID number of the ADT event record.

columns.name: EVENT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value corresponding to the type of the event record.

columns.name: EVENT_SUBTYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value indicating whether the event record has been changed or deleted.

columns.name: DEPARTMENT_ID
columns.description: The ID number of the unit of the event record at the effective time.

columns.name: ROOM_ID
columns.description: The ID number of the room of the event record at the effective time.

columns.name: ROOM_CSN_ID
columns.description: The serial number for the room contact of the event record. This number is unique across all room contacts in the system.

columns.name: BED_ID
columns.description: The ID number of the bed of the event record at the effective time.

columns.name: BED_ID_BED_LABEL
columns.description: The name of the bed.

columns.name: BED_CSN_ID
columns.description: The serial number for the bed contact of the event record. This number is unique across all bed contacts in the system.

columns.name: BED_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value corresponding to the record state of the bed of the event record at the effective time.

columns.name: EFFECTIVE_TIME
columns.description: The instant when the event was supposed to have happened.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The ID of the patient of the event record at the effective time.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_DATE_REAL
columns.description: This is a numeric representation of the date of this encounter in your system. The integer portion of the number specifies the date of the encounter. The digits after the decimal point indicate multiple visits on one day.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: EVENT_TIME
columns.description: The instant when the event record was actually created.

columns.name: USER_ID
columns.description: The ID number of the user who created the event record.

columns.name: PAT_CLASS_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value corresponding to the classification for the patient of the event record at the effective time.

columns.name: PAT_SERVICE_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value corresponding to the hospital service for the patient of the event record at the effective time.
entries: Boldly go where no service has gone before.

columns.name: PAT_LVL_OF_CARE_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value corresponding to the level of care for the patient of the event record at the effective time.
entries: <marquee>Tried to type with monster claws from Godzilla costume on</marquee>

columns.name: DELETE_TIME
columns.description: The instant when the event record was actually deleted.

columns.name: CANC_EVENT_ID
columns.description: The ID number of the canceled event record that this event record replaces.

columns.name: XFER_EVENT_ID
columns.description: The ID number of the 'transfer out' event type event record which with this 'transfer in' event type event record corresponds to a transfer action for the patient of the event records.

columns.name: COMMENTS
columns.description: The free text comment associated with the event record. This is used to hold overridden confirmation warnings by the user for the event type event record action.

columns.name: REASON_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value corresponding to the reason the event record was undone or corrected.
entries: Because I am powerful and do such things
I made a mistake & I'm sorry.

columns.name: ACCOMMODATION_C_NAME
columns.description: The accommodation code of the event. This is extracted as the category title.

columns.name: ACCOM_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value corresponding to the reason for the room accommodation for the patient of the event record at the effective time.

columns.name: ALT_EVENT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value corresponding to an alternate type for the event record.

columns.name: ORIG_EVENT_TIME
columns.description: The instant when the original subtype record for this event was actually created.

columns.name: PREV_UPD_EVNT_TIME
columns.description: The instant when the last previous update subtype record for this event was actually created.

columns.name: ORIG_EFF_TIME
columns.description: The instant when the original subtype record for this event was supposed to have happened.

columns.name: PREV_UPD_EFF_TIME
columns.description: The instant when the last previous update subtype record for this event was supposed to have happened.

columns.name: XFER_IN_EVENT_ID
columns.description: The ID number of the 'transfer in' type record which with this 'transfer out' type record corresponds to a transfer action for the patient CSN of these records.

columns.name: NEXT_OUT_EVENT_ID
columns.description: The ID number of the next 'transfer out' or 'discharge' type record for this bed for the patient CSN of these records.

columns.name: LAST_IN_EVENT_ID
columns.description: The ID number of the last 'transfer in' or 'admission' type record for this bed for the patient CSN of these records.

columns.name: STATUS_OF_BED_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value corresponding to the status of the bed of the event record at the event timestamp.
entries: NK Bed Has Been Jumped On

columns.name: BASE_PAT_CLASS_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value corresponding to the base classification for the patient of the event record at the effective time.

columns.name: OUT_EVENT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: This column contains the outgoing event type as it would currently be interpreted

columns.name: FROM_BASE_CLASS_C_NAME
columns.description: This column contains the base patient class that the patient had prior to this event.

columns.name: TO_BASE_CLASS_C_NAME
columns.description: This column contains the base patient class that the patient had after this event.

columns.name: LABOR_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: This item holds the L&D status of the encounter at the time of the ADT event.

columns.name: FIRST_IP_IN_IP_YN
columns.description: This column indicates whether this event represents the first time a patient was admitted with an inpatient base class in an inpatient-type unit.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: This item is a link to the ORD record directly responsible for generating an ADT event.

columns.name: SOURCE_LOC_EVNT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the Patient Location event that generated this Admission, Discharge, Transfer, or Leave of Absence (ADT) event. This signifies that this ADT event was created from a Patient Location update.

columns.name: EVNT_REVIEW_C_NAME
columns.description: The review status category number for the event. If empty, then this event never needed review.

columns.name: REVIEW_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time when this event was reviewed by the user.

columns.name: REVIEW_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user who reviewed this event.

columns.name: LOA_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description: The leave of absence reason category ID for the event.
entries: <marquee>Tried to type with monster claws from Godzilla costume on</marquee>

columns.name: ORIGINAL_EVENT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the original event that this event record replaces. If this event record has not been canceled or updated, this column will be equal to the EVENT_ID column. This column is not necessarily equal to the CANC_EVENT_ID column. If the original event has been updated multiple times, then this column will show the ID of the original event, not the ID of the event that was most recently replaced by this record.

columns.name: ACTION_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description: This item holds the reason behind an auto-generated event (e.g. when the service is automatically updated due to an attending provider change).

columns.name: SPLIT_ACCT_HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the hospital account for the associated event. This column will only be set for admissions enabled for split accounts.

columns.name: SPLIT_ACCT_FINANCIAL_CLASS_C_NAME
columns.description: The category ID of the financial classification that corresponds to the primary payer for the associated event. This column will only be set for admissions enabled for split accounts.

columns.name: SPLIT_ACCT_PRIMARY_PAYER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the responsible primary payer for the associated event. This column will only be set for admissions enabled for split accounts.

columns.name: SPLIT_ACCT_PRIMARY_PAYER_ID_PAYOR_NAME
columns.description: The name of the payor.

columns.name: SPLIT_ACCT_PRIMARY_PLAN_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the responsible primary plan for the associated event. This column will only be set for admissions enabled for split accounts.

columns.name: SPLIT_ACCT_PRIMARY_PLAN_ID_BENEFIT_PLAN_NAME
columns.description: The name of the benefit plan record.

columns.name: SPLIT_ACCT_OUT_FIN_CL_EV_TYP_C_NAME
columns.description: The event type category ID of the outgoing financial class for this event.

columns.name: SPLIT_ACCT_IN_FIN_CL_EV_TYP_C_NAME
columns.description: The event type category ID of the incoming financial class for this event.

columns.name: SPLIT_ACCT_FROM_FIN_CLASS_C_NAME
columns.description: The category ID of the financial class prior to this event.

columns.name: SPLIT_ACCT_TO_FIN_CLASS_C_NAME
columns.description: The category ID of the financial class after this event.

columns.name: SPLIT_ACCT_OUT_PAYER_EV_TYP_C_NAME
columns.description: The unique ID of the outgoing payer for this event.

columns.name: SPLIT_ACCT_IN_PAYER_EV_TYP_C_NAME
columns.description: The unique ID of the incoming payer for this event.

columns.name: SPLIT_ACCT_FROM_PAYER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the payer prior this event.

columns.name: SPLIT_ACCT_FROM_PAYER_ID_PAYOR_NAME
columns.description: The name of the payor.

columns.name: SPLIT_ACCT_TO_PAYER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the payer after this event.

columns.name: SPLIT_ACCT_TO_PAYER_ID_PAYOR_NAME
columns.description: The name of the payor.

columns.name: SPLIT_ACCT_OUT_PLAN_EV_TYP_C_NAME
columns.description: The unique ID of the outgoing payer for this event.

columns.name: SPLIT_ACCT_IN_PLAN_EV_TYP_C_NAME
columns.description: The unique ID of the incoming payer for this event.

columns.name: SPLIT_ACCT_FROM_PLAN_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the plan prior to this event.

columns.name: SPLIT_ACCT_FROM_PLAN_ID_BENEFIT_PLAN_NAME
columns.description: The name of the benefit plan record.

columns.name: SPLIT_ACCT_TO_PLAN_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the plan after this event.

columns.name: SPLIT_ACCT_TO_PLAN_ID_BENEFIT_PLAN_NAME
columns.description: The name of the benefit plan record.

columns.name: IS_LOA_UPDATE_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether this event is part of a leave of absence update. 'Y' indicates that the event is part of a leave of absence update, 'N' or NULL indicates it is not.

columns.name: EVENT_CONVERTED_FLAG_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates that this event has been converted to another event type.
